message.content: Since the number of people working is inversely proportional to the number of days, $(\text{workers})(\text{days})=\text{constant}$. When there are $75$ workers it takes $4$ days, which gives $75(4)=50(x)$, where $x$ is the number of days it takes for $50$ workers to complete the embankment. Simplifying the expression gives $300=50x$, and dividing by $50$ gives $x=\boxed{6}$ days.
